item.title: Readings_for_6 20 2018
item.description: The US Startup is Disappearing and Thats Bad for the Economy This was recently published from Quartz depicting the decline in companies with the age of 0-2 years old, originally published by the BLS.

item.title: Predict Economics Indicators with OpenStreetMap
item.description: This was a really cool article regarding the use of OpenStreeMap to predict the economic potential and output of a country. Specifically he is using publicly labeled tags and indicators of schools, universities, lamp posts, and post offices to see how much production and economic activity is coming from a specific region! This could be of great use for economic research in countries where reliable data is a problem or to view competitive economies from a bird’s eye view (no pun intended).
